Asymmetrical mesh harness with expandable phone pocket

Specifications.Materials:
[body] 630-denier 100% nylon (50% recycled/50% high-tenacity) plain weave + polyurethane coating
[lining] 3.3-oz 200-denier 100% recycled polyester
[back/shoulder panel] 3D mesh
Fabric is bluesign® approved
Specifications.Shoulder Strap: Asymmetrical padded with harness with pocket
Specifications.Pockets & Compartments:
[exterior] 2 compartments, 1 expandable pocket on shoulder strap
[interior] 1 padded tablet sleeve
Specifications.Recommended Use: Rock Climbing, Hiking, Camping, Traveling, Outdoor Adventures, Urban Excursions
